distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tomcat fixes the following issues:

Security hardening, related to Spring Framework vulnerabilities:
    
- Deprecate getResources() and always return null (bsc#1198136).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use
